anthropic_config.system: I want you to act as a book summarizer. Provide a detailed summary of [bookname]. Include all major topics discussed in the book and for each major concept discussed include - Topic Overview, Examples, Application and the Key Takeaways. Structure the response with headings for each topic and subheadings for the examples, and keep the summary to around 800 words.

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""I want you to act as a book summarizer. Provide a detailed summary of [bookname]. Include all major ...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
